query:
INSERT INTO island_guides (name, slug, description, location, attractions, howToGetThere, bestTimeToVisit, published) VALUES
('Male - The Capital City', 'male-capital-city', 'The vibrant capital of Maldives, Male is a bustling city with colorful buildings, rich history, and local culture. Home to the iconic Friday Mosque and National Centre, Male offers a unique glimpse into Maldivian urban life with bustling markets, restaurants, and historical sites.', 'North Malé Atoll', 'Friday Mosque,National Centre,Male City Centre,Local Markets,Artificial Beach,Hukuru Miskiy', 'Fly into Velana International Airport (20 minutes by speedboat or 30 minutes by ferry from Male). Most visitors arrive here as it is the main international airport. Local ferries and speedboats connect Male to other islands.', 'November to April', 1),
('Maafushi Island', 'maafushi-island', 'A popular local island known for its vibrant community, beautiful beaches, and water sports. Maafushi offers authentic Maldivian experiences with local guesthouses, restaurants serving fresh seafood, and easy access to snorkeling and diving sites.', 'South Malé Atoll', 'Snorkeling,Diving,Local Markets,Beach Volleyball,Fishing,Water Sports', 'Take a 45-minute speedboat from Male airport or 1.5 hours by public ferry from Male. Speedboats depart regularly throughout the day. Ferry is more economical for budget travelers.', 'November to April', 1),
('Thulusdhoo Island', 'thulusdhoo-island', 'Known as the surfing capital of Maldives, Thulusdhoo attracts surfers from around the world. The island features consistent waves, a laid-back atmosphere, and excellent local restaurants. Perfect for water sports enthusiasts and beach lovers.', 'North Malé Atoll', 'Surfing,Snorkeling,Diving,Local Restaurants,Beach Bars,Fishing Village', 'Located 40 minutes by speedboat from Male airport. Regular speedboat services available. Can also be reached by public ferry in about 1.5 hours from Male city.', 'March to October', 1),
('Banana Reef', 'banana-reef', 'A world-renowned diving and snorkeling destination famous for its abundant marine life and coral formations. Banana Reef is an atoll perfect for underwater exploration with pristine coral gardens and schools of tropical fish.', 'North Malé Atoll', 'Diving,Snorkeling,Coral Gardens,Tropical Fish,Manta Rays,Reef Sharks', 'Accessible by speedboat from Male (30 minutes) or from nearby resort islands. Most visitors join organized diving tours from Male or nearby resorts. Day trips available from Male.', 'November to April', 1),
('Dhigurah Island', 'dhigurah-island', 'A picturesque island in Ari Atoll known for its pristine beaches, vibrant coral reefs, and whale shark encounters. Dhigurah is perfect for families and offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.', 'Ari Atoll', 'Whale Shark Watching,Snorkeling,Diving,Beach Relaxation,Local Cuisine,Island Hopping', 'Fly from Male to Ari Atoll (45 minutes by domestic flight) then speedboat to Dhigurah (30 minutes). Alternatively, take a speedboat from Male (2.5 hours). Domestic flights are faster but more expensive.', 'June to November', 1),
('Ukulhas Island', 'ukulhas-island', 'A charming local island with authentic Maldivian culture, beautiful beaches, and excellent diving opportunities. Ukulhas offers a genuine island experience away from resort crowds with local guesthouses and restaurants.', 'Ari Atoll', 'Diving,Snorkeling,Local Culture,Beach Walks,Fishing,Island Exploration', 'Take a domestic flight from Male to Ari Atoll (45 minutes) then speedboat to Ukulhas (20 minutes). Or speedboat from Male to Ari Atoll (2 hours) then to Ukulhas. Local ferries available for budget travelers.', 'November to April', 1),
('Veligandu Island', 'veligandu-island', 'Famous for its stunning lagoon and pristine white sand beaches, Veligandu is an ideal destination for relaxation and water activities. The island is known for its excellent snorkeling right from the beach.', 'Ari Atoll', 'Snorkeling,Beach Relaxation,Diving,Water Sports,Sunset Watching,Photography', 'Fly from Male to Ari Atoll (45 minutes) then speedboat to Veligandu (25 minutes). Or take speedboat from Male (2.5 hours). Most visitors stay at resorts on the island.', 'November to April', 1),
('Kandooma Island', 'kandooma-island', 'A scenic island in South Malé Atoll known for its excellent diving sites, vibrant coral reefs, and diverse marine life. Kandooma offers both relaxation and adventure for all types of travelers.', 'South Malé Atoll', 'Diving,Snorkeling,Coral Reefs,Tropical Fish,Beach Relaxation,Water Sports', 'Speedboat from Male airport (30 minutes) or from Male city (45 minutes). Regular speedboat services available. Can be reached by public ferry from Male in 1.5 hours.', 'November to April', 1),
('Fulidhoo Island', 'fulidhoo-island', 'A traditional fishing village island offering authentic Maldivian experiences. Fulidhoo is known for its friendly locals, fresh seafood, and unspoiled beaches away from tourist crowds.', 'Vaavu Atoll', 'Local Culture,Fishing Village,Beach Exploration,Local Cuisine,Photography,Island Walks', 'Speedboat from Male to Vaavu Atoll (1.5 hours) then to Fulidhoo (20 minutes). Alternatively, domestic flight to Vaavu (40 minutes) then speedboat. Less touristy than other islands.', 'November to April', 1),
('Haa Alifu Atoll', 'haa-alifu-atoll', 'The northernmost atoll of Maldives, Haa Alifu offers pristine beaches, excellent diving, and authentic island culture. Less crowded than southern atolls, it is perfect for travelers seeking solitude and natural beauty.', 'Haa Alifu Atoll', 'Diving,Snorkeling,Pristine Beaches,Local Culture,Fishing,Island Exploration', 'Domestic flight from Male to Haa Alifu (1 hour) then speedboat to island resorts or local islands (30 minutes). Speedboat from Male takes 3-4 hours. Most visitors fly for convenience.', 'November to April', 1)
